pr_title: interop-testing: adds assertions to empty_stream test case.

timeline.message:
interop-testing: adds assertions to empty_stream test case.

If the server fails (e.g.: with an unimplemented status), the test still succeeds.
This change adds assertions to check the status code as well as the expected number of responses.

timeline.bodyText: Interesting, looks like this test stopped testing for these conditions in 6fbe140#diff-957966121c9393c2a61716d02c6ccf54R393. This brings things back inline with the spec, thanks!
timeline.author: ericgribkoff
